name: Crossy Duck
description:
Welcome to Crossy Duck, a game where you dodge sharks and collect coins to buy new characters!

More characters coming soon! Mind suggesting some?

Made by Skeletonz and Kevin_Eleven_1234

===============================================
Instructions:
★Tap or press space to flip the duck's direction
★The duck moves automatically
★Touch coins to gain points
★Avoid sharks
★Swipe your mouse to scroll through characters in the shop!

===============================================
Notes:
★We spend hours developing the new "swipe" feature in the character shop. Now you can swipe your mouse from left to right to scroll through all the characters! If you decide to use it, please use with credits to me. :)

===============================================
People who suggested characters that are used:
★ManofProgram- Kevin character
★isuperawesome - Shark character
★S-S-Condo Creeper character
★CookieCatRules- Nyan cat
===============================================
Credits:
★Graphics based off of vector graphics from Splish Splash Pong
★Game concept from Splish Splash Pong by Happy Magenta
★Sound effects from Splish Splash Pong
★Music is Infrared - Prism by MA Free
★Dong Nguyen for the flappy bird character
★Minecraft for the creeper character
★Crossy Road for the hipster whale character.
★Kevin_Eleven_1234 for graphic designing, text engine, intro, thumbnail and realistic swiping engine.
★Skeletonz for coding.

===============================================
★Follow to stay updated for upcoming games!
★Remember, we would not have been able to be where I am today without the help from every one of you. <3

Sep 22 2019
